pullRequest.title: Fix stage duration on stage overview
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue: #8681
Description: Fix stage duration on stage overview. It is same as the Stage details page.
Introduced v3 of Stage Instance API.

nodes.bodyText: Instead of created_time can we use scheduled_at(used in dashboard api) or scheduled_date(used in pipeline instance api)?

commit.message:
Bumped up Stage Instances API to v3 #8681

* v3 of the API adds attributes 'created_time' and 'last_transition_time'
* Deprecated v2 of the API

beforeCommit.message:
Stage overview calculate duration based on stage created and last transition time #8681

* Stage duration is calculated based on stage created time and last
  transitioned time now returned as part of the Stages API.

afterCommit.message:
Stage overview calculate duration based on stage created and last transition time #8681

* Stage duration is calculated based on stage created time and last
  transitioned time now returned as part of the Stages API.
